com.github.mikephil.charting.interfaces.dataprovider

Interface ChartInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BarDataProvider, BarLineScatterCandleBubbleDataProvider, BubbleDataProvider, CandleDataProvider, CombinedDataProvider, LineDataProvider, ScatterDataProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarChart, BarLineChartBase, BubbleChart, CandleStickChart, Chart, CombinedChart, HorizontalBarChart, LineChart, PieChart, PieRadarChartBase, RadarChart, ScatterChart

    public interface ChartInterface
    Interface that provides everything there is to know about the dimensions, bounds, and range of the chart.

      Returns the maximum x value of the chart, regardless of zoom or translation.
